entry.title: dyld: Library not loaded: /usr/local/lib/libevent-2.0.5.dylib
entry.content:
Problems with tmux?

$ tmux
dyld: Library not loaded: /usr/local/lib/libevent-2.0.5.dylib</p>

<h1>Install libevent</h1>

<p>$ brew install libevent
Warning: libevent-2.0.21 already installed</p>

<h1>Already intalled. Where is it?</h1>

<p>$brew link libevent
Warning: Already linked: /usr/local/Cellar/libevent/2.0.21
To relink: brew unlink libevent && brew link libevent</p>

<h1>Relink it</h1>

<p>$brew unlink libevent && brew link libevent

entry.title: Manage Tmux layouts with teamocil
entry.content:
Starting a tmux session? Open windows, panes, start services and more all with one command. Meet Teamocil

How to install teamocil?

$ gem install teamocil

How to create a teamocil layout?

How to use my new layout?

$ tmux
$ teamocil my_layout —here

And…
